response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but given its relevance and potential benefits to you, we believe it could be a perfect match. We are offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is designed to provide you with a unique advantage, considering its worth to you is estimated at $10,000. We are confident that by accepting this offer, you will not only secure a valuable asset but also benefit from a favorable transaction compared to what might be available elsewhere. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
